      • gen_qrcode

        public static String gen_qrcode(String[] args)
                         throws Exception
        Parameters:
        args - Input arguments where

        args[0] is the path to Result.zip and args[1] is the output directory to store QRCode.png

        Returns:
        Path to QRCode.png
        Throws:
        Exception

      • read_from_file

        public static String read_from_file(String s)
                             throws IOException
        Reads bytes from input file and encodes in Base64 BarcodeFormat
        Parameters:
        s - Input file path
        Returns:
        Base64 encoded String
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createQRCode

        public static void createQRCode(String data,
                                String file,
                                Map<EncodeHintType,ErrorCorrectionLevel> hint_map,
                                int qrh,
                                int qrw)
                         throws WriterException,
                                IOException
        Generates QRCode.png
        Parameters:
        data - String to be encoded in QRCode
        file - Output file path
        hint_map - hints used by QRCodeWriter for efficiency
        qrh - Height of QRCode.png
        qrw - Width of QRCode.png
        Throws:
        WriterException - generally if input data is too big
        IOException
